title: 1 fps, gets 20 min leaverbuster.
body: So I recently just played a game of bots. And I got 1 fps. So I just tried to stay in the game, then after the game, I get a 20 minute leaverbuster. First, it was bots. Second, we still won. And third, I had played around 20 games before my last leaverbuster. Why? Literally 15 minutes of afk = 100 minutes of your life wasted. Really?

replies.body:
This is partly why I hate the game now and left for a while. 
Riot actually need to care about their playerbase instead of money. I actually think this is funny now.
